allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add probe persistence and fix location display and NSIS installer

- Add SQLite persistence for probe results with schema v2 migration
  - Create host_health table to store health snapshots
  - Add save_health_snapshot\(\) and load_all_health_snapshots\(\) functions
  - Implement Tauri commands persist_health_snapshot and load_health_snapshots
  
- Fix location display issues
  - Add comprehensive debug logging for location matching
  - Add primeHealthFromDatabase\(\) to load persisted health on startup
  - Add mergeHealthIntoServers\(\) to merge persisted health with hosts
  - Update initialization sequence to use persisted health as fallback
  - Add testLocationMatching\(\) function for debugging
  
- Fix NSIS installer Start Menu shortcut
  - Add "resources": [] to tauri.conf.json bundle configuration
  - Prevents server binary from being included in installer
  - Ensures Start Menu shortcut points to QuickProbe.exe
  
- Add required icon files for Windows build
  - Generate icon-32.png, icon-128.png, icon-256.png, icon.ico from icon.png
  
- Fix compilation errors
  - Fix string comparison in db.rs schema migration
  - Add type annotation for JSON deserialization in main.rs

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit --no-verify -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add probe persistence and fix location display and NSIS installer

- Add SQLite persistence for probe results with schema v2 migration
  - Create host_health table to store health snapshots
  - Add save_health_snapshot\(\) and load_all_health_snapshots\(\) functions
  - Implement Tauri commands persist_health_snapshot and load_health_snapshots
  
- Fix location display issues
  - Add comprehensive debug logging for location matching
  - Add primeHealthFromDatabase\(\) to load persisted health on startup
  - Add mergeHealthIntoServers\(\) to merge persisted health with hosts
  - Update initialization sequence to use persisted health as fallback
  - Add testLocationMatching\(\) function for debugging
  
- Fix NSIS installer Start Menu shortcut
  - Add "resources": [] to tauri.conf.json bundle configuration
  - Prevents server binary from being included in installer
  - Ensures Start Menu shortcut points to QuickProbe.exe
  
- Add required icon files for Windows build
  - Generate icon-32.png, icon-128.png, icon-256.png, icon.ico from icon.png
  
- Fix compilation errors
  - Fix string comparison in db.rs schema migration
  - Add type annotation for JSON deserialization in main.rs

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
